thread.title: Tennessee to face Alabama at 3:30 or 7 p.m. ET
thread.title_full: Tennessee to face Alabama at 3:30 or 7 p.m. ET

title: Tennessee to face Alabama at 3:30 or 7 p.m. ET
text:
Tennessee to face Alabama at 3:30 or 7 p.m. ET Tennessee's kickoff time against Alabama has been narrowed down to two possible times. Post to Facebook Tennessee to face Alabama at 3:30 or 7 p.m. ET Tennessee's kickoff time against Alabama has been narrowed down to two possible times.  //on.wbir.com/1LqPPgu   Join the Conversation To   Tennessee to face Alabama at 3:30 or 7 p.m. ET 12:08 p.m. EDT October 12, 2015 Oct 10, 2015; Tuscaloosa, AL, USA; Alabama Crimson Tide head coach Nick Saban walk onto the field with his players for pre game warm ups against the Arkansas Razorbacks at Bryant-Denny Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Marvin Gentry-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Marvin Gentry, Marvin Gentry-USA TODAY Sports) 5 CONNECT 4 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The kickoff time for Tennessee's game at Alabama has been set. Sort of. 
The Vols and Crimson Tide will play at 3:30 p.m. ET on CBS or 7 p.m. ET on ESPN. 
CBS has exercised a six-day selection option for games on October 24. Along with Tennessee at Alabama, CBS is also looking at Texas A&M at Ole Miss. The game selected by CBS will air at 3:30 p.m. ET. If Tennessee is not chosen for that game, the Vols will play at 7 p.m. ET on ESPN. Read or Share this story: http://on.wbir.com/1LqPPgu TOP VIDEOS
